meanings.sent1: The celebrators cheered loudly at the parade.
meanings.sent2: We invited all the celebrators to the party.
meanings.sent3: The celebrators danced joyfully under the colorful decorations.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with celebrators, each one adding to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The group of celebrators raised their glasses in a toast to the happy couple.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in festivities or ceremonies.
meanings.sent1: The celebrators wore bright costumes to the carnival.
meanings.sent2: The celebrators gathered around the bonfire for the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The celebrators accidentally set off the confetti cannons too early.
meanings.sent4: The celebrators moved in unison, creating a mesmerizing dance.
meanings.sent5: The celebrators carried the banner proudly, leading the procession.
